name: The Courtyard (2022 Team 12)
description:
You are a journalist who’s been trying to find more information about your lost sister.

You found a clue that lead to this mysterious courtyard.

Rumors been saying that no one has returned from the courtyard, even the authority’s investigators. The courtyard has been scheduled to be destroyed multiple time but every time there is an incident that keep the courtyard safe.

You have decided to enter the mansion with a slightest hope that you may find some clues about your lost sister.

During the journey, you have to fight your way against evil, mysterious spirit, while still searching for the clues about your sister.

Will you survive and find a way to your sister, or will the your share the same fate with the others?
